body.name: Vista Moonwalk Baby Stroller in Light Gray, Lightweight Infant Stroller with Compact Fold, Multi-Position Recline Umbrella Stroller with Canopy, Extra Large Storage and Cup Holder

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 3 mins
features: FUNCTIONAL SEATS: Multi-position seat back and full-size seat offers complete comfort for your child Enjoy an easy single-hand switch to the fully reclining position The lightweight seat comes with a comfortable padded back

SAFE & SECURE: Comes with a padded 5-point harness system, rear wheel brakes and swivel front wheels for a smoother ride over bumps, which lock in, when straight. The angle and slope between the padded handle and rear wheels make space for easy walking

USEFUL FEATURES: Extra large storage basket below is ideal for holding toys, groceries, and diaper bags. The full-size canopy has a pop out sun visor and provides adequate shade as LO naps. The seat cover is removable and makes for easy cleaning

FOLDS COMPACTLY: It folds compactly for storage and makes for the perfect travel companion. Folded dimensions: 11Lx10Wx44.5H inches. Perfect for on the go parents It is Disney-approved and meets the stroller size specs for Disney parks
PRODUCT SPECS: Product dimensions: 32L x 17.75W x 39.75H inches, making it a compact delight It weighs 13.4 lbs and is available in three finishes. Cup holder included
body.description: The Dream On Me VISTA Moonwalk stroller is super lightweight, durable and compact stroller, perfect for on the go parents. The comfort features for baby include: a full-sized seat, multi-position recline & Padded seat back, hassle-free canopy with pop out sun visor, padded 5-point safety harness and more. Its swivel front wheels provide a smoother ride over curbs and uneven surfaces. The backrest can be adjusted to a sleeping position and the canopy provides good sunshade while your little one naps. The backrest position on the VISTA is adjusted single handed enabling a smooth transition between different positions. The angle and slope between the padded handle and rear wheels make space for easy walking. Vista Moonwalk comes with huge storage basket for baby and Mama's essentials. It's all comfort and convenience for you and your child. When your excursion is over, it folds compact for easy storage and travel. Time to go shopping!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Vista Moonwalk Stroller is the ideal portable stroller for today’s on-the-go parents. It folds compactly and is lightweight, making it ideal for travel. Comes with a fully reclining seat, a host of safety features and has ample storage. Practical, functional and stylish!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and perfect
reviews.reviewText: Love this so muchIt is lightweight but sturdy. It has a cup holder. A 5-point harness. Detachable front wheels and rear wheels with brakes. The seat is easy to recline and there is a lot of storage space at the bottom. The canopy is detachable there is also a peep hold which can be closed at the top of the canopy so you can see your the back of the canopy can be closed and opened easily. The entire thing is easy to store. Its packaging was lightweight just 16lb and it's a long slender box making it fit easily in your vehicle of choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, great materials!
reviews.reviewText: Oh W O W !!! SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER. Folds up easily. I 💆🏽‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and looks really nice. I put my diaper bag at the bottom and the velcro piece that holds the material tore off so that’s useless now. I’d say don’t put anything too heavy under it otherwise it does its job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An answer to prayers but not the easiest to store
reviews.reviewText: We were going on vacation and I needed a smaller stroller for my one year old. This stroller came in clutch. Took me a minute to figure out how to operate but once you get a hang of it, it's no big deal! Now that the vacation is over, I am having some trouble finding the best place to store it.Picture of the stroller in the back of the Mazda CX-9. It's better than keeping it in the trunk but not very convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Would not really recommend
reviews.reviewText: We bought this stroller after doing research for our trip to Disney. We chose this because of the way it folds up and can be reclined which was perfect for napping. However , we had several issues with this stroller.-The sunshade will NOT stay on. We have had to fix it every time we try to use it . I am not sure why but it never stays on and it is very inconvenient to keep stopping to fix it.-The straps for putting my toddler in the stroller keep coming apart . This happens almost every time we buckle him in and out . I'm not sure if our stroller has some sort to defect, but it takes up a lot of time fixing this .-The bar is not removable, which is fine, but it doesn't allow for ease taking your child out . My son is only one, but on the taller side for his age . It's still really hard to get him out and he has to stretch out his legs so that we can remove him.-The storage is okay, not too large underneath. Enough to fit water bottles, sunscreen, etc. It didn't fit our diaper bag which was fine. However if we hang our diaper bag on the back when my child is not in the stroller, it will fall backwards . It just not very sturdy.I would not recommend this stroller for a theme park or travel/trips. The issues have been causing us to take a lot of time on our visit to fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to carry out
reviews.reviewText: Love this stroller I can carry my baby and the stroller down the stairs without feeling overwhelmed it's also super easy to open and close would defetnely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Mi niña tiene 2 años pero ella es gordita pensé q no iba a caber. Pero si el único problema esq q la barra de adelante no se puede mover es muy difícil 😥 para mi sacarla ya q es grande y pesada.Tiene 28 meses y pesa 45Lb Pues en los comentarios no vi q pusieran ese detalle me hubiera encantado 🤩 q se pudiera quitar. Por lo demás Es perfecta ya q la utilizo para Ser mandado serca de la casa a dejar a mi otra niña a la escuela donde mi mi hija me acompaña Ella le encanto su carriola

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but folding lock is unusable and bumper doesn't come off.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This stroller works great and is very sturdy, but the folding lock is impossible to use. I even tried to use channel locks to clip it onto the bar as the pictures show it should be used and that wouldn't work. I made a strap out of industrial strength velcro and some large ribbon to lock it for now. Also, the front bumper bar is not removable. I tried, but it doesn't come off, which is the one main issue I have with this. I used my points and a gift car to buy it, so I don't think I can get those back. If I could, I'd probably get a different one where the bar is removable and the folding lock works.
